name: ScareMe
0:
”Alexa, launch Scare Me and tell me a scary story”
”Alexa, launch Scare Me and ask Scare me to tell me a scary story”
”Ask Scare Me to tell me a scary story”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scare me
des:
Are you bored and is horror your genre? Is it 2 AM and you want to bust the myth that no horror story really scares you? Get prepared as Alexa gears up to tell you a scary story! Are you really as brave as you say? Let's find out.

Alexa will tell you super short horror stories. All you have to say is, Alexa, scare me.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
